title: Celebrations

abstract: A documentary presenting six different  celebrations involving people in the multicultural community of Melbourne.
description: A documentary film presenting six different and authentic celebrations involving people in the multicultural community of Melbourne. Depicts an Aboriginal dance showing body decoration preparation, an Indonesian Moslem wedding celebration, an Australian child's birthday party, a Greek nameday party, Christmas festivities and a Northern Italian Christmas celebration. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
